summary: This FBI 302 form documents Sprint's response to a Federal Grand Jury subpoena from the Southern District of New York, dated August 15, 2019, as part of the Epstein investigation. The document was drafted on December 6, 2019, and entered into the FBI system on December 9, 2039.

events.title: Sprint's Response to Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: Sprint provided a response to a Federal Grand Jury subpoena served by the Southern District of New York as part of the Epstein investigation.

events.title: FBI 302 Document Drafted
events.description: The FBI 302 document summarizing Sprint's response to the grand jury subpoena was drafted.

events.title: FBI 302 Document Entry
events.description: The FBI 302 document was entered into the FBI system, indicating it was logged or processed at this late date.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: Sprint was served with a Federal Grand Jury subpoena by the Southern District of New York in the Epstein investigation.
Sprint provided a response to the subpoena on August 15, 2019.
The FBI 302 document summarizing this response was drafted on December 6, 2019, but not entered into the FBI system until December 9, 2039â€”a 20-year delay.
The document is part of FBI case 90A-NY-3151227-GJ and is marked as not to be distributed outside the receiving agency.
The document contains no recommendations or conclusions, only factual reporting of Sprint's response.
